Menu

• Manage & Simplify Processes
    Simplify complicated and inconsistent practices by standardizing how involvement opportunities are structured and advertised.
  • Track Student Involvement
    Collect and verify participation information with mobile devices to better understand student engagement.
  • Assess Behaviors & Trends
    Visually identify trends, compare effectiveness, and make data-driven decisions to better engagement, improving retention.
  • Engage More Students
    Reach students where they are - on web and mobile - with branded assets that get students involved.
  • Encourage & Measure Learning
    Design, build, and map learning outcomes to experiences and gamify involvement with our SmartTranscript.
